channel.title: 562 Npc help!
channel.description:

item.title: 562 Npc help!
item.dc:creator: @adamgruber12 adamgruber12
item.description:
@adamgruber12 wrote:

so what should i do, or what did i do wrong?

item.title: 562 Npc help!
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

For starters, a compiler is for Java files, not XML.
